Name: Bild N. Boolok
Desc: Don't step on the blocks barefoot.

1.Name: Block Hopscotch
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Swings a staff and assembles blocks into a giant hammer to attack the enemy. After hitting the enemy four times or completing three hammer swings, leaps up and slams down, causing <color=#FFFFFF>Block Spikes</color> to erupt outward. Enemies take <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> upon coming into contact with <color=#FFFFFF>Block Spikes</color>.

1.Name: Red Light! Nobody Move!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character in your squad: Bild N. Boolok's <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> releases 7 <color=#FFFFFF>Block Spikes</color>, and its <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> DMG increases by 30%.

1.Name: Castle Dodgeball
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Swings its staff with full force, launching blocks ahead to deal massive <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.
